snippet: If he hasn’t already, Romney should pick up Colin Dueck’s history of Republican foreign policy, “The Big Short” by Michael Lewis — and Bill Clinton’s autobiography.
abstract: If he hasn’t already, Romney should pick up Colin Dueck’s history of Republican foreign policy, “The Big Short” by Michael Lewis — and Bill Clinton’s autobiography.
